pullrequest.title: Added movable text to apply force dialog

content.html:
It doesn't compile:

/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:172:20: error: request for member ‘getUserObjectBindings’ is ambiguous
   dPtr->forceText->getUserObjectBindings().setUserAny(
                    ^
In file included from /usr/include/OGRE/OgreShadowCaster.h:32:0,
                 from /usr/include/OGRE/OgreMovableObject.h:37,
                 from /usr/include/OGRE/OgreBillboardChain.h:37,
                 from /usr/include/OGRE/Ogre.h:40,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/ogre_gazebo.h:26,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/MovableText.hh:28,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:21:
/usr/include/OGRE/OgreRenderable.h:360:29: note: candidates are: const Ogre::UserObjectBindings& Ogre::Renderable::getUserObjectBindings() const
   const UserObjectBindings& getUserObjectBindings() const { return mUserObjectBindings; }
                             ^

   UserObjectBindings& getUserObjectBindings() { return mUserObjectBindings; }
                       ^

/usr/include/OGRE/OgreMovableObject.h:345:29: note:                 const Ogre::UserObjectBindings& Ogre::MovableObject::getUserObjectBindings() const
   const UserObjectBindings& getUserObjectBindings() const { return mUserObjectBindings; }
